transcript-processed-expression-barcodes.description: Barcode column names (MEX format) for processed matrix.

transcript-processed-expression-features.title: Processed transcript expression MEX features
transcript-processed-expression-features.description: Feature row names (MEX format) for processed matrix.

mitochondrial-expression.title: Mitochondrial expression levels
mitochondrial-expression.description: Per cell mitochondrial gene expression as percentage total of total gene expression.

whitelist.description: The barcodes found in the library that remain after filtering.

transcriptome_annotation.description: Transcriptome annotation generated by Stringtie during transcript discovery stage

gene_expression_umap.title: Gene expression umap
gene_expression_umap.description: UMAP matrix from gene expression. Varying number of files will be present based on number of umap repeats.

transcript_expression_umap.description: UMAP matrix from transcript expression. Varying number of files will be present based on number of umap repeats.
